messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] John Holt on line
messages.msgSnippet: ... Isn t Home Taught Gail Withrow s site?  She s made a business out of dissing John s work. -- Cindy Ferguson crma@ix.netcom.com
messages.messageBody:
ddzimlew@... wrote:
>
> A Google search turned up a fair amount of John Holt's writings at
> different locations.
> A new Holtie could get a taste of what he was trying to express. Beware,
> the TCS site has " The Dark Side of John Holt" oooooweeeeoooo...
> mostly commentary on some Holt writings - interpreted to be dissing
> children. And Home taught, is that Bridget?, only had a few quotes
> which were being dissected as a means to prove unschooling wouldn't work.
>

Isn't Home Taught Gail Withrow's site? She's made a business out of
dissing John's work.

--

Cindy Ferguson
crma@...

messages.subject: John Holt on line
messages.msgSnippet: A Google search turned up a fair amount of John Holt s writings at different locations. A new Holtie could get a taste of what he was trying to express.
messages.messageBody:
A Google search turned up a fair amount of John Holt's writings at
different locations.
A new Holtie could get a taste of what he was trying to express. Beware,
the TCS site has " The Dark Side of John Holt" oooooweeeeoooo...
mostly commentary on some Holt writings - interpreted to be dissing
children. And Home taught, is that Bridget?, only had a few quotes
which were being dissected as a means to prove unschooling wouldn't work.


Anyway, Google search "John Holt"

Deb L, googling way too early.
